structure.unit: RURAL ELECTRIC AND RURAL TELEPHONE COOPERATIVE CORPORATIONS

law.catch_line: Change of location of principal offices.
law.text: A cooperative may, upon authorization of its board of trustees or its members, change the location of its principal office by filing a statement of change in accordance with KRS 14A.5-010.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 151, sec. 87, effective January 1, 2011. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 147, sec. 12, effective March 25, 1950.
